mapper.insert: insert into tb_article (id, title, cover, author, category, origin, state, views, publish_time, edit_time, create_time, type, content, content_md) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{views,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{contentMd,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tb_article
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
origin = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
views = #{views,jdbcType=BIGINT},
publish_time = #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
content_md = #{contentMd,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
